mapper.sql: pid, begindt, value1, value2, value3, value4, value5, countnum, value6, value7, value8, value9, value10
mapper.delete: delete from excel10data where begindt BETWEEN #{beginDT,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and #{endDT,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into excel10data(pid, begindt, value1, value2, value3, value4, value5, countnum, value6, value7, value8, value9, value10 ) values (#{pid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{begindt,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{value1,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{value2,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{value3,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{value4,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{value5,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{countnum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{value6,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{value7,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{value8,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{value9,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{value10,jdbcType=DECIMAL} )

insert.foreach:
insert into excel10data (
) SELECT #{item.pid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.begindt,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.value1,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.value2,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.value3,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.value4,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.value5,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.countnum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.value6,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.value7,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.value8,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.value9,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.value10,jdbcType=DECIMAL} FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM excel10data WHERE begindt= #{item.begindt,jdbcType=CHAR} LIMIT 1 )
